name: Solaris-compatible Thread Library (STL)
short_description: The Solaris-compatible Thread Library (STL) enables applications that use the Solaris threads API (thr_create(), mutex_lock(), etc.) to be ported to other systems that have a POSIX threads library. STL maps between Solaris types and POSIX types, and adds
